content.query:
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        bulk 'https://isphere.blob.core.windows.net/synapse/BYOD/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging_2021-08-08-00-08-30.csv',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
